definition: Ganquan county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]
Ganquan county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi

sentences.english: I choose change into the fresh-tasting spring water inflow wheat field.
sentences.chinese: 我選擇化爲甘泉流入麥田。

sentences.english: Kim was carried out of the ring by stretcher and rushed to Desert Springs Hospital.
sentences.chinese: 隨後，金被擔架擡出拳擊臺，送往沙漠甘泉醫院。

sentences.english: Through archaeological survey, it has been proved that there were many buildings erected out of the Kunming Pond in Ganquan.
sentences.chinese: 考古調查證明，甘泉昆明池中曾有多個水面建築。

sentences.english: "Desert and spring of love" became the master melody in Mauriac's creation.
sentences.chinese: “愛的荒漠與甘泉”成爲莫里亞克創作中的主旋律。

sentences.english: Some drink from the fountain of knowledge; this person only gargled.
sentences.chinese: 我們痛飲知識的甘泉，這個人只是用來漱口。

sentences.english: I am a bourn, you are my mellifluence.
sentences.chinese: 我是一條小溪，你是我的甘泉。
